name: MOLDTRANS-TUR
summary: A limited liability company (SRL) that filed administrative litigation seeking annulment of unfavorable administrative acts and issuance of a favorable individual administrative act.

name: AUTOGARA INTERNAȚIONALĂ CHIȘINĂU
summary: A limited liability company (SRL) that jointly filed administrative actions with MoldTrans-Tur against Chișinău municipal authorities.

name: PRIMĂRIA MUNICIPIULUI CHIȘINĂU
summary: The City Hall of Chișinău, respondent in multiple administrative cases.

name: CONSILIUL MUNICIPAL CHIȘINĂU
summary: The Chișinău Municipal Council, respondent and appellant in the proceedings.

name: ASOCIAȚIA DE COPROPRIETARI ÎN CONDOMINIU NR. 55/319
summary: A homeowners’ association listed as third party/intervenor in the case.

name: AGENȚIA PROPRIETĂȚII PUBLICE
summary: Public Property Agency named as respondent in later filings.

name: AGENȚIA SERVICII PUBLICE
summary: Public Services Agency referenced as a third party in the administrative dispute.

name: FIVA
summary: A limited liability company (SRL) mentioned as a third party in the dispute.

name: DT-PRO BUSINESS
summary: A limited liability company (SRL) referenced as a third party.

name: ÎNTREPRINDEREA INDIVIDUALĂ DAN ȚURCAN LIDIA
summary: A sole proprietorship cited as a third party.

name: SPERANȚA UNIC
summary: A company (SA “Speranța-Unic”) whose earlier action was admitted and later renounced in related proceedings.

name: JUDECĂTORIA CHIȘINĂU, SEDIUL BUIUCANI
summary: First-instance court that issued the 6 August 2018 judgment.

name: JUDECĂTORIA CHIȘINĂU, SEDIUL RÂȘCANI
summary: First-instance court handling re-trial and subsequent connected cases.

name: CURTEA DE APEL CHIȘINĂU
summary: Court of Appeal that issued decisions on 7 Feb 2019 and 3 May 2023.

name: CURTEA SUPREMĂ DE JUSTIȚIE
summary: Supreme Court of Justice that admitted a 2019 recourse, scheduled an admissibility hearing, and ruled on the acceleration request.

name: HOTĂRÂREA 6 AUGUST 2018 (JUDECĂTORIA CHIȘINĂU – BUIUCANI)
summary: First-instance judgment later affected by appellate and supreme court decisions.

name: DECIZIA 7 FEBRUARIE 2019 (CURTEA DE APEL CHIȘINĂU)
summary: Appellate decision (7 Feb 2019) that rejected appeals and maintained the 2018 judgment.

name: DECIZIA 20 NOIEMBRIE 2019 (CURTEA SUPREMĂ DE JUSTIȚIE)
summary: Supreme Court decision admitting recourse, quashing prior decisions, and remanding for re-trial (20 Nov 2019).

name: ÎNCHEIEREA 1 IULIE 2021 (JUDECĂTORIA CHIȘINĂU – RÂȘCANI)
summary: Ruling dated 1 July 2021 concerning the administrative case initiated on 11 March 2021.

name: ÎNCHEIERILE 2 NOIEMBRIE 2021 (JUDECĂTORIA CHIȘINĂU – RÂȘCANI)
summary: Rulings dated 2 Nov 2021 ordering the connection of cases 3-2758/21 and 3-2759/21 with the earlier case before Judge Ciumac.

name: DECIZIA 3 MAI 2023 (CURTEA DE APEL CHIȘINĂU)
summary: Appeal decision (3 May 2023) adverse to MoldTrans-Tur and Autogara Internațională Chișinău.

name: MITROPOLIA BASARABIEI
summary: Religious organization (Metropolis of Bessarabia) involved in a separate litigation concerning church property (2003 contract).

name: CONSILIUL SUPERIOR AL MAGISTRATURII
summary: Judicial self-governance body mentioned in first-instance challenges (Judge Stănilă’s docket).

name: CONSILIUL SUPERIOR AL PROCURORILOR
summary: Prosecutorial self-governance body mentioned in first-instance challenges (Judge Stănilă’s docket).

name: DIANA STĂNILĂ
summary: Judge at the Supreme Court noted for a heavy caseload and membership in special panels, affecting scheduling.

name: VITALII CIUMAC
summary: Judge of the Chișinău court (Râșcani) who handled connected cases (e.g., case no. 3-4645/2019).

name: ART. 6 §1 CEDO
summary: Article 6(1) of the European Convention on Human Rights (ECHR) on reasonable time in civil proceedings, invoked as a standard.

name: CODUL ADMINISTRATIV
summary: Administrative Code, which provides the procedural framework for administrative litigation.

name: CODUL DE PROCEDURĂ CIVILĂ
summary: Civil Procedure Code, applied supplementarily to administrative cases.
